title: Connection Error
body: Every time I log into league on either of my accounts, I keep getting a connection error. I've restarted my internet, I've restarted the client SEVERAL times, I've restarted my pc, and it's still not working. It was working fine yesterday. Is something up with the league servers? Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Is your ISP CenturyLink? If so they are working on fixing this issue as we speak. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance?comment=000e

Thank you, I looked around and I didn't see this post. I actually do have CenturyLink in Texas, so I'm happy to know it's not my end. 
Much appreciated. <3
Fellow Century link Texan...I know your pain brother lol

Just hope they get it resolved soon, I've been itching to do some ranked. I haven't been able to play on my pc due to overheating problems, so I told my friend to come over and bring his setup, and I'll let him play Overwatch if he lets me play league. Then this shit happens. Sad day.

I'm happy to see *DaedÃ¤lus* was able to provide context on your issue and a link to the thread the issue is being tracked on. 

If you're still having issues with your PC overheating, I recommend checking out our [Overheating solution video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFrZbViFqf8) brought to you by our very own *Digital Ram*!

Let me know if you have any questions.
Yeah, it appears to be an issue with Kansas and Texas CenturyLink, Iowa CenturyLink users were having issues as well but Riot fixed it for them.
